p: Data were analyzed using the statistical program GraphPad Prisma 6.0. Differences between treatment with Norfloxacin and treatment with Norfloxacin combined with EOPC (or Chlorpromazine) were analyzed using a two-way ANOVA test, using the geometric mean of the triplicates as the central data and standard deviation. Then, a post hoc Bonferroni test was performed and p values < 0.05 were considered significant.
